text: Amteka is a village in the Chirang district in the state of Assam in India. The village covers an area of . It has a population of 5,646. ==Educational institutions== * Amteka ME School * Amteka High School * Gurudev Kalicharan Brahma Academy * Grace English School * Upendra National Academy == References == Category:Villages in India Category:Assam
title: Amteka
